## AlTrigger() function

Annotation for trigger type classes. Prevents unique event type names from being lost during minification/uglification.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function AlTrigger(eventTypeName: string): (ctor: Function) => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventTypeName | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`(ctor: Function) => void`
